name: SHAKE YOUR FRIENDS
description:
SHAKE YOUR FRIENDS

is a game about developing friendship and make new friends.

Manage your social life so you can give love in a smart way to all your friends, and make time to meet new people!

You can go to the movies, watch the stars in the sky, eat a very good pasta with your fellas. Dont be slopy and invite your dearest friends to your activities. 

Single Player ,20 minutes Game.
